About Me

Frontend Developer based in London, UK

Hi, I am Abul Yousuf. Frontend developer. Proficient in Git/GitHub, Accessibility, HTML, CSS, Sass, Tailwind CSS, Responsive Design, JavaScript, Web APIs, React & Styled Components with a sound knowledge of backend technologies including Node.js, Express.js, SQL, PostgreSQL & MongoDB. I am passionate about building robust, high quality, well-tested Web applications that scale to meet users' needs.

I am looking for opportunities where I can work hard, learn and contribute to an impactful team.

I am a graduate from Bath Spa University Web Development Bootcamp October 2021 Cohort specializing in Frontend Development using React.

I have returned to code after many years.

Previously I had trained myself in computer programming in an IBM Advanced Career Education centre. I learned Advanced C Programming, Unix/Linux Shell Scripting, Data Structures and Algorithms, Databases Concepts and Design, Object-Oriented Concepts, Object-Oriented Analysis and Design.

I had worked in software development for three years and used Visual Basic, SQL Server, PHP & MySQL during that time before moving to the UK in 2003.
